We hypothesize subtle difference different molecule innate immunity may contribute either predisposition clinical course infection Blastomycosis dermatitidis . To test hypothesis , propose analyze allelic frequency 15 different gene ( mannose binding lectin , Fc-gamma receptor IIa IIb , Fc-gamma receptor IIIa IIIb , myeloperoxidase , tumor necrosis factor-alpha -beta , interleukin 1A 1B , interleukin-1 receptor antagonist , interleukin-10 , NRAMP-1 , chitotriosidase , chemokine receptor 5 ) intragenic polymorphic form compare data incidence severity Blastomycosis dermatitidis infection . With study hope identify group molecule innate immunity influence risk severity invasive Blastomycosis dermatitidis infection .

DOC.detailed_description: Innate immunity play important role fungal recognition initiation fungicidal activity . We hypothesize subtle difference different molecule innate immunity may contribute either predisposition clinical course infection Blastomycosis Dermatitidis . To test hypothesis , propose analyze allelic frequency 15 different gene ( mannose binding lectin , Fc-gamma receptor Ila IIb , Fc-gamma receptor IIIa IIIb , myeloperoxidase , tumor necrosis factor-alpha -beta , interleukin 1A 1B , interleukin-1 receptor antagonist , interleukin-10 , NRAMP-1 , chitotriosidase , chemokine receptor 5 ) intragenic polymorphic form compare data incidence severity Blastomycosis Dermatitidis infection . With study hope identify group molecule innate immunity influence risk severity invasive Blastomycosis Dermatitidis infection .
